props.alignSelf: Applies the [align-items](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/align-items) css property. Available options are **start**, **center**, **end**, **auto**, **baseline** and **stretch**.
props.cols: Sets the default number of columns the component extends. Available options are **1 -> 12** and **auto**.
props.sm: Changes the number of columns on small and greater breakpoints.
props.md: Changes the number of columns on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.lg: Changes the number of columns on large and greater breakpoints.
props.xl: Changes the number of columns on extra large and greater breakpoints.
props.offset: Sets the default offset for the column.
props.offsetSm: Changes the offset of the component on small and greater breakpoints.
props.offsetMd: Changes the offset of the component on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.offsetLg: Changes the offset of the component on large and greater breakpoints.
props.offsetXl: Changes the offset of the component on extra large and greater breakpoints.
props.order: Sets the default [order](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/order) for the column.
props.orderSm: Changes the order of the component on small and greater breakpoints.
props.orderMd: Changes the order of the component on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.orderLg: Changes the order of the component on large and greater breakpoints.
props.orderXl: Changes the order of the component on extra large and greater breakpoints.
